Recipe.title: Crispy Peanut Butter Cookies
Recipe.Source: Adapted from the Cooking Channel web site
Recipe.Description: We have tried many different recipes for Peanut Butter Cookies. Josh found this recipe and although he used the correct ingredients, he totally ignored the directions and did things his own way. The results were quite different from anything else we have tried. The cookies are a lot thinner than others, and they are a bit crispy on the bottom and edges. They are now Di's all-time favorite.

section.instruction: In a large bowl, mix Flour, Baking Soda, Salt, Brown Sugar and Sugar.
Add Butter and mix with a rubber spatula until it is blended in.
Add Eggs, Peanut Butter and Vanilla, and mix well.
Place 1-inch balls of dough about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet.

Notes.note: The dough is really sticky, so making the balls can end up being a bit of a chore.
